alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 5:25PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Walthall, Pike and eastern Amite Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 525 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Liberty to 10 miles east of Magnolia. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mccomb, Liberty, Magnolia, Summit, Smithdale and Mccomb Airport. This includes Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 4 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southern Mississippi.
